backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing chat threads, messages, user profiles, access entitlements, and authorization checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test coverage.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining color tokens, theme variables, and dark‑mode overrides.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top‑level React app handling auth flow, profile setup, access checks, and routing to chat UI.
frontend/src/components/access/PendingAc: UI screen for users without chat access, allowing request or refresh of entitlement status.
frontend/src/components/admin/AccessMana: Admin dialog for granting, revoking, and approving access requests, with optional chat initiation and user/entitlement management.
frontend/src/components/auth/Authenticat: Full‑screen loading view showing the PriveChat logo while authenticated session data loads.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Button that handles login/logout via Internet Identity and manages UI states during authentication.
Main chat layout managing thread list, active thread view, new chat flow, admin access dialog, and settings dialog.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatThreadV: Displays a chat thread with messages, participant info, blocking and deletion options, and auto‑scroll behavior.
frontend/src/components/chat/MessageComp: Input bar for composing and sending messages with validation, error display, and loading feedback.
frontend/src/components/chat/MessageItem: Renders a single message with sender info, edit/delete controls, and deleted‑message handling.
Lists user threads, showing basic metadata and enabling thread selection with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/chat/UserSearchS: Provides a UI for searching users and creating new chat threads, handling loading, errors, and thread creation states.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Dialog prompting the user to submit a display name and register their profile with a simple form.
frontend/src/components/profile/UserBadg: Displays the current user's avatar, display name, and a shortened version of their principal.
frontend/src/components/settings/Setting: Settings dialog showing the user's principal, user lists based on admin status, and clipboard copy actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useAccessControl.ts: React Query hooks for checking admin status and managing access entitlements including grant, revoke, and approve actions.
Hooks for checking and requesting user access entitlements, refreshing related queries, and deriving access state.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance tied to the user's identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useBlocking.ts: Hooks for checking, listing, blocking, and unblocking users with reactive query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Provides hooks to fetch, save, and register the current user's profile, and to retrieve the current principal.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context and provider for authentication, exposing identity state and login/logout methods.
frontend/src/hooks/useMessages.ts: Defines mutations to send, edit, and delete messages, invalidating message queries on success and enforcing access checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useThreads.ts: Contains hooks to fetch threads and messages, and to create or delete threads with appropriate query invalidation and access checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useUsers.ts: Provides hooks to fetch chat users, search users, fetch all entitlement-based users, and load specific user profiles.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining light/dark theme variables and layout rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React, query client, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/utils/clipboard.ts: Utility for safely copying text to the clipboard with error handling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session-stored parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, extended theme settings, custom colors, animations, and includes typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Defines overall project state for the PriveChat app, including requirements, architectural notes, known issues, and feature metadata for debugging and planning.
